description: Small Business Improvement Fund (SBIF) program grants made since 2001. SBIF uses Tax Increment Financing (TIF) revenues to help owners of commercial and industrial properties within specific TIF districts to repair or remodel their facilities for their own business or on behalf of tenants. For more info, go to http://bit.ly/p91J7T.

name: Small Business Improvement Fund (SBIF) Grant Agreements
